Description:

Total War: Rome 2 will provide an opportunity to manage the first world superpower and 
command her striking and numerous armies to subdue opponents political, military or economic means. 
The creators of the Total War series combines elements of real-time gameplay and step mode. 
During the campaign, you can move for move to conquer the land, and enjoy the battles involving 
tens of thousands of people under your command in real time. Heavily modified engine Warscape in 
Total War: Rome 2 would allow consideration of an exotic city in the smallest detail, and the new 
camera will make it possible to observe the battlefield from any angle.

Features repack

Total War: Rome II
Do not cut / recoded
The ability to combine text and voice (see the screenshots installer)
Version of the game - v1.13.0 build 11398.543170
